voice_response.begin: The reasons for the score of the selected objective (${selected_arch_id}) are:
voice_response.repeat: Subobjective ${obj_name} has a value of ${obj_value} out of 1 and a weight of ${obj_weight}

visual_response.begin: The reasons for the score of the selected objective (${selected_arch_id}) are:
visual_response.item_template: Subobjective ${obj_name} has a value of ${obj_value}/1.0 and a weight of ${obj_weight}
